#summary Console command: config set
#labels console

= Config Set =

Change the value of a property.

== Syntax ==

{{{config set <config-name> <config-value>}}}

Where:

 * config-name  Name of the configuration to change
 * config-value Value to set

== Example ==

{{{
> config set db.cache.enabled false

Remote configuration value changed correctly
}}}

== See also ==

To know all the configuration values use the [ConsoleCommandConfig config]. To read a configuration value use the [ConsoleCommandConfigGet config get].

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
